DescriptionText.Text: I went into a zombie infestation and cleared it out. Destroyed the screamers who were attracting 'em and wiped out the rest of the zombies. Should be safe here for a little while. - %1$s.
I found the belongings of a fallen ally and brought them home. - %1$s.
We found a backpack containing the belongings of a fallen neighbor and brought them home. - %1$s.
I gathered resources and brought them home. - %1$s.
We found a backpack containing gathered resources and brought them home. - %1$s.

SummaryText.Text: Recovered a backpack of gathered resources

DescriptionText.Text: Our outpost took out an incoming horde. - %1$s

TutorialText.Text: The others can fight the hordes on their own too, but there's always some risk.

DescriptionText.Text: I intercepted and destroyed an incoming horde before it could do much damage. - %1$s.

TutorialText.Text: The others can fight the hordes on their own too, but there's always some risk.

DescriptionText.Text: We fended off another zombie horde. - %1$s.

TutorialText.Text: These attacks gradually wear down morale.

DescriptionText.Text: We fended off yet another zombie horde. It's really starting to wear on everyone. - %1$s.

TutorialText.Text: These attacks gradually wear down morale.

DescriptionText.Text: We fended off another zombie horde, but we're in bad shape. I'm not sure we can handle another one. - %1$s.
Our outpost took out an incoming horde. - %1$s

TutorialText.Text: The others can fight the hordes on their own too, but there's always some risk.

DescriptionText.Text: I intercepted and destroyed an incoming horde before it could do much damage. - %1$s.

TutorialText.Text: Destroy hordes to slow the spread of infestations.

DescriptionText.Text: Our scouts spotted a horde moving in to create a new infestation. We weren't in a position to stop it. - %1$s.

NameText.Text: SEARCH AND RESCUE: Missing Person Found

DescriptionText.Text: We all run into trouble sometimes. There's nothing more important than going out and finding one of our people. - %1$s.
Our resource stockpiles were running a little low so I went out to find what we needed. Mission accomplished. - %1$s.

Climbed up high and got a good look at the surrounding environs. It's important to do this periodically. - %1$s.
I found what we needed and brought it home. There was much rejoicing. - %1$s.
